content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

2->4->7->8 shortest path: 478

Note: The graph format I provided here assumes that each node has a unique integer ID starting from 0. Please confirm if this is the case for your graph.

2->3->7 shortest path: 37

Note: The graph format I provided here assumes that each node has a unique integer ID starting from 0. Please confirm if this is the case for your graph. If your graph ID's start from 1 or higher, then the nodes you need to follow should be obtained by subtracting 1 from the ID's in the 'edges' array.
